letters.description: Conduct an intuitive energetic assessment to identify blockages or imbalances within the client's biofield.
Utilize clearing techniques to release stagnant energy and open restricted meridian or chakra pathways.
Harmonize the physical, emotional, and spiritual layers of the energetic body to create a cohesive field.
Channel high-vibrational healing energy to restore and replenish the client's vital life force.
Fine-tune the client's frequency to align with their desired state of health and intentional resonance.
Equip the client with grounding techniques and daily energetic hygiene practices to maintain their transformation.
